title: A menina que matou os pais - A serie
overview: The mini-series shows Suzane von Richthofen and Daniel Cravinhos' versions about their relationship, their motives and the shocking crime that took place on the night of October 31st 2002. Based on the proceedings of the trial, the story transits from narrative to the testimonies given at court, and further still, interviews with the cast, the Director and the criminologist and script writer.
